snippet: O'NEILL--Mary Jane. The Eye-Bank for Sight Restoration mourns the loss of its former executive director (1980-2000) Mary Jane O'Neill, the fifth director in the history of the organization which was founded in 1944. Her leadership in the field here and on a national level earned her the Eye Bank Association of America's (EBAA) prestigious Heise Award in 1997 and the Mary Jane O'Neill Fellowship in International Eye Banking was established in her honor in 2002. During her years leading The Eye-Bank, more than 25,000 New Yorkers received the beautiful gift of sight. Her legacy will live on in the vision of others. The Board of Directors and Patricia Dahl, Executive Director/CEO The Eye-Bank for Sight Restoration 1/3

During her years leading The Eye-Bank, more than 25,000 New Yorkers received the beautiful gift of sight. Her legacy will live on in the vision of others. The Board of Directors and Patricia Dahl, Executive Director/CEO The Eye-Bank for Sight Restoration 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  O'NEILL, MARY JANE
